TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Light it on fire and see what happens.

Waiter, there's a bagel in my soup!

No sir. That is the painted edge of your bowl ^^

Waiter, there's a huge cockroach in my soup. And it puts its elbow on the bowl's edge! >:-[

Well, you asked for extra protein!

Waiter, there's a cow standing on another cow in my soup!

I'll take it away if you are allergic to cats, BUT NO REFUNDS (I'm allergic)

I was hoping you would say "No it isn't" but never mind.

Waiter, there's a cow standing on another cow in my soup!

And it's cows all the way down. They hold the whole world up you know.

Waiter, there's a planet in my soup.

You ordered "Celestial Bodies N' Noodle" soup, right?

Waiter, there is a fusion device in my soup.

No sir, that is actually a portal gun.

Waiter, there is an Austria in my soup!

I'm sorry, I mistook you for a soupstremist.

Waiter, why is there a fork in my soup?

It's the latest fashion. Yes, everybody is eating their soup with forks now. Here's a knife to cut it with.

Waiter, there're infinite monkeys in my soup.

They were probably atracted by the Banana soup!

Waiter, theres a Tsar Bomba in my soup

yes its pretty spicy isnt it?

waiter why is there a Firefly in my soup

Yes, it's to provide light.

Waiter there's a ham and cheese crepe in my soup!

Good for you.

Waiter, there's a soup in my!

In your what?

Waiter, there's soup in my soup!

that is its intended function

Waiter, there's a booster in my soup!

Good. We've been having some TWR issues with those.

Waiter, there's some antimatter in my soup!

I thought you wanted the soup with least fat!

Waiter, there is a train in my soup!

oh GOD IT IS COMING OUT OF THE SOAP RUNNNN!!!!

waiter there is NRE in my soup!

Don't worry i'm sure that their constructing your soup.

Waiter! Theres a vending machine in my soup!

It's our new method of payment.

Waiter! There's a Korean character in my soup!

We put this in our soup to comply with new policies regarding literacy of soup consumers.

Waiter! There's a bunch of neutrinos in my soup!

Thats because you ordered the reactor soup.

Waiter! Theres a form thread in my soup!

Oops! That was supposed to be the forum thread soup. I'll just go and get you an extra "u"

Waiter, there's a hole in my soup.

That's because you forgot to turn of the deathray of doom which comes with it.

Waiter, there's dark matter in my soup.

Where? I don't see anything.

Waiter, there's some BlueSubstance in my soup.

SOME!? Are there really more than one BlueSubstance?

Waiter, there's a

in my soup!
